item.title: Gold Farmers
item.dc:creator: @pookey71 Pookey71
item.description:
@pookey71 wrote:

Buzzy:

How does the economy fall without them. Jagex isn’t going to let the economy fail because they got what they want. They will do something to reduce the inflation. I’m against the level 3 mules, not the people who auto on their mains.

Not many people are interested to get 1k yews.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold Farmers
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

But thinking about it, if these people went on so far and jagex tried to sort it out, yews could get so low that the people might even start to drop them, then the “Farmers” would go out of business

Read full topic

item.title: Gold Farmers
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

uncfan1119:

Yews go down, more people high alch yew longs, get richer, willing to pay more for stuff, everything that chinamen can’t get easily, like treasure trails, ect will go up in price

I mean not as a direct result of the prices. I’m talking about the extra trees. How it will be easy to find yews to chop, and how easy wc will be after you reach 60, how it will be comparable to cooking and fletching as the easiest skills to level, and how shitty it is.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold Farmers
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

In a way wouldn’t it be good to set up a gold type farming thing, But for the fun mostly, to bond with each other and lesson each other in language skills.

Just think, They all have fun right?

Read full topic

item.title: Gold Farmers
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

according to talk in game i’ve been hearing that chinamen actually craft nature runes.

Although that could just be the people angry that natures have gone down in price.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold Farmers
item.dc:creator: @uncfan1119 uncfan1119
item.description:
@uncfan1119 wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:16, topic:122676”][quote author=Buzzy link=topic=172382.msg1592972#msg1592972 date=1184340911]
You forget the fact that they have the ability to make it easier to get yews by adding more to the game. It would be very easy to manipulate the economy if you knew what you were doing.
[/quote]

So to compensate for the lost autoers, they’d have to add enough so everyone has enough yews, then attract more people to chop yews. It’s just not going to happen. It will cheapen wc-ing as a skill. Think about all the effects besides just lowering the prices.[/quote]

Yews go down, more people high alch yew longs, get richer, willing to pay more for stuff, everything that chinamen can’t get easily, like treasure trails, ect will go up in price

Read full topic

item.title: Gold Farmers
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Buzzy:

You forget the fact that they have the ability to make it easier to get yews by adding more to the game. It would be very easy to manipulate the economy if you knew what you were doing.

So to compensate for the lost autoers, they’d have to add enough so everyone has enough yews, then attract more people to chop yews. It’s just not going to happen. It will cheapen wc-ing as a skill. Think about all the effects besides just lowering the prices.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold Farmers
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

You forget the fact that they have the ability to make it easier to get yews by adding more to the game. It would be very easy to manipulate the economy if you knew what you were doing.

item.title: Gold Farmers
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Buzzy:

How does the economy fall without them. Jagex isn’t going to let the economy fail because they got what they want. They will do something to reduce the inflation. I’m against the level 3 mules, not the people who auto on their mains.

What will they do? When they introduced pure ess, the prices of laws doubled. If they cut out yew autoers, I’d say their prices would more than triple. What are they going to do? Lower interest rates? Jagex has little control over the RS economy, if you haven’t realized.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold Farmers
item.dc:creator: @Buzzy Buzzy
item.description:
@Buzzy wrote:

How does the economy fall without them. Jagex isn’t going to let the economy fail because they got what they want. They will do something to reduce the inflation. I’m against the level 3 mules, not the people who auto on their mains.

item.title: Gold Farmers
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Buzzy:

I personally take offense to any gold farmers on RuneScape, and would have no problem reporting the whole company to Jagex. Autoing to me is ok if you risk it on your own account, but what gold farmers are doing is ruining the game.

Do you buy your own yews? How would you like the price of yews to skyrocket? I actually don’t care, but gold farmers are an integral part of RS. If they go, so does the RS economy.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold Farmers
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

uncfan1119:

How could you get paid to walk on a rs acct? Are the idiots not smart enough to walk to the bank and back? $30 USD\HR would own az. I wonder if the illegal aliens are going to take the us’s gold farming jobs (if there is any).

Hmm wtf. I only get paid $12.50 an hour at my internship. I guess it’s time for a career shift.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold Farmers
item.dc:creator: @voiD_dev voiD dev
item.description:
@voiD_dev wrote:

In Australia if you go work at a gaming workshop it is $30 per hour for walking on a runescape account.
I live in Sydney prices may range in diffrences. But I only worked there once. Pay might be higher because I was just a newcommer.

Chinese Gold Farmers are more expensive but they play for longer.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold Farmers
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

I see. Yea they’re all pretty cool. I love how you can make money off anything, eh? And tbh, I don’t look down upon gold farmers at all. It’s a respectable job. It’s not like they do it for fun… it’s gotta get mad boring.

Read full topic

item.title: Gold Farmers
item.dc:creator: @uncfan1119 uncfan1119
item.description:
@uncfan1119 wrote:

I think these are all wow gold farms, but it’s the same with rs for sure. Just they are controlling multiple accounts at the same time on 1 computer, I suggest watching the 2nd, 3rd, and 4th video, though.
